phrases.phrase: <title>Enable "What did friends buy"?</title><info>If yes then the menu "What did friend buy" and all information about buying actions of friends on some items shown, else they will be hidden</info>
<title>Allow users to edit their rating and review on Stores?</title><info></info>
<title>Allow users to edit their rating and review on Products?</title><info></info>
<title>Allow users to delete their rating and review on Stores?</title><info></info>
<title>Allow users to delete their rating and review on Products?</title><info></info>
<title>Allow owners of Stores to delete rating and review on their Stores?</title><info></info>
<title>Allow owners of Stores to delete rating and review on Products in their Stores?</title><info></info>
<title>How many New Stores items (All Store)?</title><info>This setting tells how many stores will be shown in the New Stores block. Default is 6.</info>
Set to Yes, if admin want store to be automatically approved after published.
Set to Yes, if admin want product to be automatically approved after published.
Can delete store created by other users?
Can edit store created by other users?
Can edit product created by other users?
Can delete products created by other users?
Set points for each store this user created
Set points for each product this user created
Name of package can not be empty
Enter a numeric value. 0 if you want this package to be free
Maximum cover photos can be displayed
Maximum number of product allowed to create
If blank or set to 0, the number of product is unlimited.
If blank or set to 0, the number of photos is unlimited.
Feature store for free after apply this package

Fee for featuring products in store
Valid period have to be a number and at least 0
Package Fee have to be a number and at least 0
Maximum cover photo have to be a number and at least 0
Feature store for free after have to be a number and at least 0
Fee for feature store have to be a number and at least 0
Feature products fee have to be a number and at least 0
Name of package cannot be empty.
Which information about products you want to help your members to compare?
Which information about stores you want to help your members to compare?

Open New Store / Step 2 - Input Information

Store publishing fee depend on what package you choose at step 1

Control who can see this store.

Maximum number of product cannot be empty

Please select an image to upload
Enter a numeric value. 0 means never expired
Some issues happen. Please try again, thanks

<title>Distance Measurement Unit</title><info>Select default distance Measurement Unit.</info>
Note: This store is featured unlimited time
Note: This store is featured until {expire_date}
Are you sure want to delete these stores ? This action cannot be reverted and all products in these stores will be lost!
Are you sure want to delete this store ? This action cannot be reverted and all products in store will be lost!
You do not have permission to feature this store.
You can not close this store.
You can not reopen this store.
{full_name} wrote a comment on your store "{title}".
{full_name} wrote a comment on your store "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
Unable to find the store you are trying to comment on.
Your store "{store_name}" is approved by {sender}. For more detail, please view this link: {link}
Your store "{store_name}" is denied by {sender}. For more detail, please view this link: {link}
Your store in "{site_name}" site is approved.
Your store in "{site_name}" site is denied.
Store "{store_name}" in "{site_name}" site is now reopened.
Store "{store_name}" in "{site_name}" site is now temporarily closed.
Store "{store_name}" in "{site_name}" site is now temporarily closed. For more detail, please view this link: {link}
Store "{store_name}" in "{site_name}" site is now reopened. For more detail, please view this link: {link}

We find that your new choice is more limited than the last package. If you still want to choose this package, some pieces of your data will be hidden.
Although your data can be restore if you reuse the old package later, we recommend using the same package again or use the full-services packages.

Your store "{store_name}" package will expire on {date}. Please check and pay for renewal on time or all trading activities of the store will be suspended until you buy new.
Check now

Receive Renewal Notification Before the EXP

Discount ("0" or blank mean no discount)

Discount percentage must be less than or equal to 100 percent.

Minimum order quantity must be less than or equal to maximum order quantity.
Sorry! This item is temporarily closed because it's out of stock or by some reasons. Leave your email contact to be notified as soon as it come back
photos can add to each product
Number of photo can add to each product is unlimited
You can not reopen this product
Eventhough the inventory is enable, it only actually work if you don't have any attribute plan. The plan for attributes will be defined later, at Manage Attributes section.

Attribute plan might override your stock inventory that you provided before at create section.
You already added this digital product to your cart.
You can not add more item to cart because it has reached maximum order quantity.
Stock quantity must be greater than or equal to total quantity of attributes ({total}) or 0 for unlimited. If you want to update quantity of attributes, please follow this link.
Stock quantity must be 0 or blank for unlimited cause this product have an attribute with unlimited quantity. If you want to update quantity of attributes, please follow this link.
Your store "{store_name}" package has just expired, so its status is changed to Expired. All trading activities of the store will be suspended until you buy a new. Check now
Are you sure want to remove this item?
Are you sure want to remove all items?

You do not have permission to manage orders this store.
Product "{product_name}" is now reopen to buy.
Product "{product_name}" is now reopen and allow to buy. Let's come and get it, please follow this link: {link}
You can add maximum {quantity} item(s) for this product.
Your product "{product_name}" is feature unlimited by {sender}
This store belong to package which not supported attributes. You can change package of "{store_name}" to another to supported this featured

phrases.phrase: <title>Pagination Style (All Stores)</title><info>Select Pagination Style at Search Stores Page.</info>
<title>Pagination Style (All Products)</title><info>Select Pagination Style at Search Products Page.</info>
Define the limit of how many new arrivals/products can be displayed. Set 0 will hide this block.
"New Arrivals/Products Limit" must be greater than or equal to 0.
Define the limit of how many weekly hot selling products can be displayed.
"Weekly Hot Selling Products Limit" must be greater than or equal to 0.
Define the limit of how many featured products can be displayed.
"Featured Products Limit" must be greater than or equal to 0.
Define the limit of how many featured stores can be displayed.
"Featured Stores Limit" must be greater than or equal to 0.
Define the limit of how many weekly hot seller can be displayed.
"Weekly Hot Seller Limit" must be greater than or equal to 0.
